select1.label: Check order of physician collect equipment and supplies and wash your hands
Provide privacy and institute safety precautions , arrange the supplies and equipment
User universal precaution andaseptic techniques as appropriate

TEST F0R SUGAR: THE CLINI TEST
-Obtain urine specimen at designated time -Add 5drops of fresh urine to test tube with dropper , by dropping thme in center of test tube .for accuracy don not let the drops run along the siede s of test tube. A diffretstrenghth tablet requires fewer drops of urine and water -Add 10 drops of water to urine and shake gently to mix urine and water -Take one clini test tablet from bottle in to the lid of bottle then pour the tablet into the test tube .hold test tube nea top and keep it stiff while reaction occurs -After 15 seconds , sake test tube gently and compare the color changes of specimen with cliniest color chart -Wash , rinse and dry equipments and retrn to storage -Record reading in patient chart
Tes Tape Test / Dipstick for sugar
-Dip the strip , stick or tape into urine -Wait for specified amount of time -Compare the reaction with color chart -Clean and store equipment , record result
Ketosic Test
-Ketosic strip is dipped in urine -Wait for 15 secs , then compare ketosic with color chart printed on package
